title: Add footnotes option to final document (הערות שוליים)
description:
## Footnotes Feature

### User Flow:
1. User clicks 'Start Editing' (כניסה למצב עריכה) to enter edit mode
2. User places cursor where they want the footnote reference
3. User clicks 'Add Footnote' button
4. Dialog opens asking for footnote content
5. On approve:
   - System checks existing footnotes on current page
   - Assigns next sequential number (per-page numbering, resets each page)
   - Inserts superscript number at cursor position
   - Adds footnote content at bottom of page with separator line

### Requirements:
- Footnote numbering: Per-page (resets to 1 on each new page)
- Footnote placement: Bottom of page with separator line
- Edit/Delete: User can edit or delete existing footnotes
- Export support: Both PDF and DOCX exports must include footnotes
close_reason: Core footnotes feature implemented: add footnotes at cursor position, per-page numbering, PDF export (via custom edits), DOCX export (appendix section). Remaining enhancements: replace native prompt with dialog UI, add edit/delete functionality.
